items.content_html: Acadex is a user-friendly CRUD application designed to manage student data efficiently. With an easy-to-navigate frontend connected to a backend powered by Express.js on Node.js, it allows users to create, read, update, and delete student records effortlessly. The data is stored in a lightweight flat file database, offering simplicity and speed.
items.title: Ummamali/acadex: Acadex is a user-friendly CRUD application designed to manage student data efficiently. With an easy-to-navigate frontend connected to a backend powered by Express.js on Node.js, it allows users to create, read, update, and delete student records effortlessly. The data is stored in a lightweight flat file database, offering simplicity and speed.
